abstract: The bomb, which tore through Friday evening prayers at a mosque in Quetta, Pakistan, also injured at least 18 more, with many in critical condition.
lead_paragraph: LAHORE, Pakistan â€” A bomb blast inside a mosque in southwestern Pakistan, believed to be frequented by senior Taliban figures, killed at least 15 people on Friday and wounded at least 18 more, according to police officials.
keywords: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
